generic-invite: What do you want to do?

location-BoardingHouse_BackwoodsPlateau: I'm at the boarding house, it's very close to the bus stop.
location-MineEntrance: I'm at the entrance to this dark and scary cave behind the boarding house.
AbandonedMine1A: I was able to go down into this cave near the boarding house, but not very deep.
AbandonedMine1B: I'm exploring the second level of the cave near the boarding house. It's scary in here...
AbandonedMine2A: The descent into the boarding house cave took longer than I thought it would. I am now on third level.
AbandonedMine2B: How deep do you think that cave by the boarding house goes? I'm on the fourth floor right now.
AbandonedMine3: The cave at the boarding house is very deep. I managed to get to fifth level!
AbandonedMine4: This cave by the boarding house seems endless. I'm already on sixth level.
AbandonedMine5: I'm in a cave by the boarding house. In its depths. It's very hot in here. The ancients left a crypt here, no wonder Joja decided to explore it.
TheLostValley: Я... it's a strange place. It's like a whole world beneath ours. Could something like this really exist beneath the boarding house?
Ruins: I'm in an Aboriginal village, just east of this descent into an abandoned valley. This place seems so... ancient. It's as if civilization had never touched it.
Leah-event-2: How I Feel About You (Six Hearts)
